statements.delete: DELETE FROM substation WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID = #SvgUID#
statements.select: SELECT cast(1.0 as decimal(12,1)), "UID", "EleID", "EleName", cast("Burthen" as decimal(12,2)) as Burthen, cast("Number" as decimal(12,2)) as Number, "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation WHERE EleID = #EleID# and SvgUID = #SvgUID#

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# and glebeEleID= #glebeEleID# and ObligateField1= #ObligateField1#

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# and EleName= #EleName#

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation WHERE SvgUID = #SvgUID# and EleID in ( $EleID$ ) and ObligateField1= #ObligateField1#

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation WHERE LayerID = #LayerID# and ObligateField1= #ObligateField1#

SELECT t1.uid as "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation t1,PSP_PowerPicSelect t2 where t1.LayerID=t2.PicSelectID and t2.EachListID=#UID# and t1.ObligateField3='规划'

SELECT t1.uid as "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation t1,PSP_PowerPicSelect t2 where t1.LayerID=t2.PicSelectID and t2.EachListID=#UID# and t1.ObligateField3='运行'

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation where ObligateField3='运行'

SELECT DISTINCT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation WHERE Number NOT IN (0) and UID in (SELECT min(UID) FROM substation group by Number) ORDER BY Number ASC

SELECT "UID", "EleID", "EleName", "Burthen", "Number", "glebeEleID", "SvgUID", "Remark", "LayerID", "ObligateField1", "ObligateField2", "ObligateField3", "ObligateField4", "ObligateField5", "ObligateField6", "ObligateField7" FROM substation where ObligateField1=#ObligateField1# and LayerID in (select SUID from SVG_LAYER where yearid=#UID#) order by EleName
